name: Rhentsu
description:
Embark on this adventure in search of a mysterious galactic artifact, full of action and sensual women ❤. Fight different bosses and find out what can happen if this artifact falls into the wrong hands.

In this game you control Sara's Ship, our most charming heroine in the universe. She will fight against various enemies to prevent this artifact from falling into the wrong hands. She will go through 8 challenges and fight 8 bosses to get what she was paid to do. Each challenge won gives you points to unlock and win the hearts of 8 beautiful women.

Come have fun in this adventure packed with Beautiful Women and full of action.

And if you liked this adventure, don't forget to recommend this game and share your LIKE.

Main features:
1. ❤8 Levels❤
2. ❤8 sex scene❤
3. ❤34 achievements❤
